title: Verdantix Announces May 2016 EH&S Information Management Summit In Chicago And The Inaugural Verdantix EH&S Information Management Awards
text:
Verdantix Announces May 2016 EH&S Information Management Summit In Chicago And The Inaugural Verdantix EH&S Information Management Awards 2nd Annual Verdantix EH&S Information Management Summit 
May 16-18, 2016 at the Palmer House Hilton, Chicago October 06, 2015 12:52 PM Eastern Daylight Time 
NEW YORK--( BUSINESS WIRE )--Verdantix will host its second annual EH&S information management summit at the historic Palmer House, Hilton hotel in Chicago. Key themes for the summit: Improving incident management with software Using mobile devices and apps to improve EH&S performance Selecting, implementing and getting value from EH&S platforms Innovations in safety management and occupational health Using EH&S software to enhance operational risk management Succeeding with multi-site and global EH&S information management 
“The Verdantix Summit is shaped by our comprehensive research on the EH&S software and product stewardship markets” commented Verdantix CEO, David Metcalfe. “With the support of the leading players in the software and services markets this will be a world class event for EH&S professionals. By attending you will ensure you have a full understanding of how to get value from existing IT systems, learn what is available on the market and meet people who can help you with new projects. No other event in 2016 will bring together so many senior experts in EH&S information management.” 
Marquee Sponsors 
The Verdantix Summit is supported by Platinum Sponsors CH2M and Enablon; Gold Sponsors Arcadis, EtQ, Intelex, VelocityEHS; Silver Sponsors AECOM, CMO, Gensuite, ProcessMAP, Rivo Software; Awards Sponsor IHS; Bronze Sponsors 360factors, Isometrix; Welcome Drinks Sponsor Enviance. 
Early Bird Tickets Available 
Check out the Verdantix EH&S Summit website to learn more about the event and purchase tickets at the early bird rate. Delegate tickets for vendors are limited to 100. 
Significantly Discounted Hotel Rooms At Palmer House, Hilton 
Verdantix has negotiated a special rate of just $249.00 per King Bedroom at the event venue. Book now to lock in the most cost effective accommodation in downtown Chicago. 
Apply For An EH&S Information Management Award 
On May 17, Verdantix will host its inaugural EH&S information management awards ceremony in the luxurious surroundings of the Empire Room at the Palmer House, Hilton. If you have been involved in a successful EH&S information management project apply now to win. 
For Sponsorship Inquiries 
Take advantage of the few remaining sponsorship packages. Email info@verdantix.com with subject line: Summit Sponsorship Contacts
